Class StandardTransactionSampler

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.sampling.interfaces.AbstractTransactionSampler
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.engine.sampling.standardsamplers.StandardTransactionSampler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISowable
public class StandardTransactionSampler extends AbstractTransactionSampler
A standard implementation of AbstractTransactionSampler.

This sampler provides transaction-level samples for simulation purposes, including:

  • Transaction arrival intervals (Poisson distribution)
  • Transaction fee values (Normal distribution)
  • Transaction sizes (Normal distribution with lower bound)
  • Random integers for generic sampling (Uniform distribution)

Supports optional seed updates to enable reproducible random sequences, controlled by seedUpdateEnabled, seedSwitchTx, and simID.

Author: Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University

    • getNextTransactionArrivalInterval

      public float getNextTransactionArrivalInterval() throws Exception
      Returns a sample of the interval until the next transaction arrives.

      Uses a Poisson distribution with rate txArrivalIntervalRate. Interval is returned in milliseconds.

      Specified by:
      getNextTransactionArrivalInterval in class AbstractTransactionSampler
      Returns:
      a sampled transaction arrival interval in milliseconds
      Throws:
      Exception - if sampling fails

    • getNextTransactionFeeValue

      public float getNextTransactionFeeValue()
      Returns a sample of the transaction fee.

      Uses a Normal (Gaussian) distribution with mean txValueMean and standard deviation txValueSD.

      Specified by:
      getNextTransactionFeeValue in class AbstractTransactionSampler
      Returns:
      a sampled transaction fee value
      See Also:
      • AbstractTransactionSampler.getNextTransactionFeeValue()

    • getNextTransactionSize

      public long getNextTransactionSize()
      Returns a sample of the transaction size.

      Uses a Normal distribution with mean txSizeMean and standard deviation txSizeSD. A minimum size of 10 is enforced. If a valid sample cannot be generated within 100 tries, the program exits with an error.

      Specified by:
      getNextTransactionSize in class AbstractTransactionSampler
      Returns:
      a sampled transaction size (long)
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

    • getRandomNum

      public int getRandomNum(int min, int max)
      Returns a random integer between the given bounds (inclusive).

      Uses a Uniform distribution.

      Specified by:
      getRandomNum in class AbstractTransactionSampler
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum value (inclusive)
      max - the maximum value (inclusive)
      Returns:
      a random integer in [min, max]
      See Also:
      • AbstractTransactionSampler.getRandom()

    • LoadConfig

      public void LoadConfig()
      Loads configuration values from Config for transaction sampling. Initializes seed update settings and current/initial seeds.

      seedUpdateEnabled - whether seed updates are enabled
